config:

---
flowchart LR
 subgraph O[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    direction TB
        OUT[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
  end
    DEF[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] -- defines “45%” --> BARG[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    SOFT[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] -- affects bargaining --> BARG
    COMP[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] -- adds constraints --> BARG
    GOV[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] -- shifts boundaries --> VFI[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    DISC[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] -- adds load --> VFI
    ABF[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] -- feeds data --> DEF
    BARG -- resets rules --> DEF
    BARG -- tightens audits --> COMP
    BARG -- extends deals --> SOFT
    BARG -- sets integration terms --> GOV
    VFI -- spillover demand --> OUT
    DISC -- occupancy loop --> OUT
    OUT -- media pressure --> POL[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    POL -- changes stance --> BARG
    OUT -- crisis response --> BARG
    POL -. narrative .-> DEF

     OUT:::outcome
     DEF:::secondary
     BARG:::primary
     SOFT:::secondary
     COMP:::secondary
     GOV:::secondary
     VFI:::primary
     DISC:::secondary
     ABF:::secondary
     POL:::primary
